title: Jio Financial Services | Lead AI (Band II) | Mumbai
content:
**Education:** B.Tech/M.Tech (or relevant degree)  
**Years of Experience:** 4+
**Prior Experience:**  Financial & AI/ML Experience  
**Date of the Offer:** February 2025  
**Company:** Jio Financial Services  
**Title/Level:** Lead AI
**Location:** Mumbai  
**Salary:** ₹36,00,000  
**Relocation/Signing Bonus:** ₹3,00,000 (Joining Bonus)  
**Stock Bonus:** N/A  
**Bonus:** ₹9,00,000 (Performance-based STI + LTI)  
**Total Comp (Salary + Bonus + JB):** ₹48,00,000  
** First Year **: 36 +3 + 4.5+ 1.1= 44.6

title: PhonePe Software Engineer (3-5 YOE)
content:
Education: B.Tech from IIT
Years of Experience: 3
Prior Experience: SDE 2 at a startup
Prev Comp: 40 LPA
Company: PhonePe
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: India
Salary: 42LPA
Stock bonus: 30LPA over 4 years
Bonus: 5LPA Fixed + Relocation support 
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 42 + 5 + 7.5 = 54.5
